title: SimCity+ Update.10.1+17 DLC.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Duo 2 GHz or higher
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with Shader third model 
(ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better, NVIDIA 7800 or better, Intel HD Graphics 
or better)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.2 GB

Description:

Town-planning simulator with you again! Create the city of your dreams; 
make the right choices in life your characters! Each solution has real 
consequences. Invest in heavy industry, and your capital increase - 
but at the expense of the health of your characters, as it will degrade 
the environment. Implement environmentally friendly technology and 
improve the quality of your characters, at the risk of higher taxes and 
unemployment. Unite with friends to solve global issues: space shuttle 
launch, reducing radioactive emissions or built an amusement park. 
Vying for the title of the richest, most dirty, or the best place in the 
international and regional leaderboards!

Features repack

SimCity
With Update v10.1
Do not cut / recoded
